statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={189.4}{e}^{{{0.0354}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements; round accordingly.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0354}}\approx{1.0360340395438}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.0360340395438}-{1}={0.036034039543767}\approx{0.036} and the percent is 3.6.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
